meanings.definition: A substance that causes irritation or inflammation in one part of the body in order to relieve pain or inflammation in another part.
meanings.sent1: The counterirritant helped reduce the pain in my knee by creating irritation on my skin.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a counterirritant to alleviate the inflammation in my shoulder.
meanings.sent3: Using the counterirritant made my skin feel like it was having a little party to distract from the knee pain.
meanings.sent4: The counterirritant worked like a secret agent, creating chaos on the skin to save the knee from discomfort.
meanings.sent5: I could almost see the counterirritant marching into battle on my skin, fighting the pain away.

meanings.definition: Something that distracts attention from an unpleasant or painful situation.
meanings.sent1: The comedy show served as a counterirritant, making everyone forget about the bad news.
meanings.sent2: Her cheerful personality acted as a counterirritant during the difficult times.
meanings.sent3: The silly dance became a counterirritant, turning the sad atmosphere into a joyful one.
meanings.sent4: Laughter was the best counterirritant, easing the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful painting worked as a counterirritant, drawing attention away from the gloomy weather outside.
